name: Stephan Luckhaus
content:
Stephan Luckhaus is a German mathematician who is a professor at the University of Leipzig working in pure and applied analysis.[1] His PhD was obtained in 1978 under the supervision of Willi Jäger at the University of Heidelberg.[2] He was elected to the German Academy of Sciences Leopoldina in 2007.[1]

raw:
German mathematician
 Stephan Luckhaus
Stephan Luckhaus is a German mathematician who is a professor at the University of Leipzig working in pure and applied analysis.[1] His PhD was obtained in 1978 under the supervision of Willi Jäger at the University of Heidelberg.[2] He was elected to the German Academy of Sciences Leopoldina in 2007.[1]
